Articles.Content:
Considering the amount of time I have played KSP thus far I should have stopped in earlier and said hello. I have been pretty much chronicling all my launches and achievements into a kind of Blog format with it sometimes appearing as a mission report or a new's broadcast xD. I do have a question though besides an entire website (well I could do a website) what would be a good medium to do updates on my current achievements and missions? Normal blog? I thought about a post in the forums with updates on my games current situation as I rather enjoy writing out what recent launches have been like and plan for future ones. Not entirely sure where in the forum though, the writers section I guess? Not really a story per say or fan fiction just me playing through a self campaign I planned out, very similar to the one in the forums.

Thanks everyone!

-NCSA

Neblian Company Space Agency
